QuestData.Title: The Mysterious Missive
QuestData.Description: <On the body, you find a missive emblazoned with the seal of the Army of the Light. $b$bIf the messenger was killed to prevent the letter's delivery, its contents must be of great import.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Search near the Xenedar for someone with knowledge of the Sealed Missive.
QuestData.CompletionText: Our fight goes on, champion. Argus must fall.$b$bWhat is that you've found?
QuestData.RewardText: You've found one of our scouting reports? It was overdue, and I feared it had been intercepted by the enemy.$b$b<The captain looks over the letter.>$b$bYes, this is what I've been expecting. The Legion is planning something and this is the breakthrough we've been looking for!
